summary: The Carolina Panthers are an NFL football team based in Charlotte, North Carolina. They play in the NFC South division. The team was founded in 1993 and had an impressive start, with a winning record in their second season. They've won the NFC Championship twice and reached the Super Bowl three times but haven't won it yet. The Panthers have a strong fan base across the Carolinas and are currently owned by David Tepper.
title: Carolina Panthers
